getStarted.carousel01_text: Predict illnesses, track health trends, and store your journey securely - all in one place.
getStarted.carousel02_text: Track and protect your entire family's health with ease and confidence every day.
getStarted.carousel03_text: Access your full health history and future - smart, secure, and always available.

home.What is Diabetesans: Diabetes is a long-term condition where the body cannot properly produce or use insulin, resulting in high blood sugar levels.
home.What is Hypertensionans: Hypertension is when the blood pressure in the arteries stays too high for too long, raising the risk of heart disease and stroke.
home.What is Coronary artery diseaseans: Coronary artery disease (CAD) occurs when heart arteries narrow due to plaque buildup, significantly increasing heart attack risk.
home.What is StrokeAns: Stroke is when blood flow to the brain is blocked or ruptured, often causing brain damage and impairing vital functions.

terms.OverviewAns: Welcome to Medpredit! These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of the Medpredit mobile application ('App'), operated by Medpredit Technologies ('we,' 'our,' 'us'). Medpredit provides healthcare-related services, including online consultations, appointment scheduling, prescription management, health tracking, and more.
terms.AgreementAns: By accessing or using the App, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must immediately stop using the App.
terms.User AgreementAns: By using Medpredit, you confirm that you accept and agree to these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, you should not use the App.
terms.Health Record ManagementAns: Store, access, and share your medical records securely.
terms.Health Content and ToolsAns: Access health-related articles, blogs, and tools to help monitor your well-being.
terms.Document ManagementAns: Upload the prescription and other X-rays to store them as documents.
terms.Age RequirementAns: You must be at least 18 years old, or have the consent of a parent or guardian if you are under 18.
terms.Legal CapacityAns: You must have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement.
terms.Account CreationAns: To access certain services, you will need to create an account with Medpredit. You must provide accurate and complete information during registration and keep your account details up-to-date.
terms.Account SecurityAns: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities conducted under your account.
terms.Use the App only for lawful purposes: Use the App only for lawful purposes.
terms.Do not disrupt or interfere with the fun: Do not disrupt or interfere with the functioning of the App.
terms.Do not impersonate any individual or ent: Do not impersonate any individual or entity or misrepresent your affiliation with anyone.
terms.Do not upload, post, or transmit harmful: Do not upload, post, or transmit harmful content, including but not limited to malware, viruses, or illegal material.
terms.Service DisclaimerAns: The healthcare services provided through the App are not a substitute for in-person medical care.
terms.Consultation AdviceAns: You should always consult with a physician or other qualified healthcare provider before making any medical decisions.
terms.Right to RefuseAns: Healthcare providers have the right to refuse service if they believe it is not in the patient’s best interest.
terms.ResponsibilityAns: It is your responsibility to ensure that prescriptions are filled at licensed pharmacies and follow the instructions provided by the healthcare provider. Medpredit is not responsible for any errors or issues related to prescriptions or medications.
terms.Data SubmissionAns: By submitting health-related information, including medical records, health data, or communications to healthcare providers, you grant Medpredit a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, process, and display this information for the purpose of delivering services through the App.
terms.Privacy PolicyAns: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal and medical data. By using Medpredit, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in the Privacy Policy.
terms.Service FeesAns: Certain services on Medpredit may require payment. You agree to pay any applicable fees for services provided through the App, such as consultation fees, prescription charges, or appointment fees.
terms.Payment AuthorizationAns: Payments are processed securely, and you authorize Medpredit to charge your payment method accordingly.
terms.Third-Party DisclaimerAns: Medpredit may link to third-party websites or services not operated by us. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party services. You access these services at your own risk.

privacy.content: Medpredit Technologies ('Medpredit,' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use the Medpredit mobile application ('App') and its associated services. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of your personal data as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.Personal InformationAns12: When you register for the App, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
privacy.Personal InformationAns22: We may collect payment details when you make transactions through the App, such as credit card information, billing address, and payment method information (processed securely through third-party payment providers).
privacy.Personal InformationAns32: We may collect information about your health preferences, medical history, allergies, current medications, and other details you provide to create your medical profile on the App.
privacy.Health InformationAns12: When you use the App to track your health data, such as symptoms, diagnoses, treatments, and test results, we may collect and store that information.
privacy.Health InformationAns22: If you consult a healthcare provider through the App, we may collect the details of the consultation, including medical advice, prescriptions, and any related documents.
privacy.Health InformationAns32: If you connect your medical devices or wearables to the App, we may collect data related to your health and fitness metrics (e.g., heart rate, blood pressure, sleep patterns).
privacy.Usage DataAns12: We may collect information about how you interact with the App, including your IP address, device type, browser type, operating system, and activity within the App (e.g., pages viewed, features accessed).
privacy.Usage DataAns22: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how you use the App, personalize your experience, and track performance. You can control cookie preferences through your device settings.
privacy.How We Use Your InformationAns12: To facilitate online consultations, medical advice, appointment scheduling, prescription management, and tracking of your health data.
privacy.How We Use Your InformationAns22: To enhance the functionality and user experience of the App, analyze usage patterns, and identify areas for improvement.
privacy.How We Use Your InformationAns32: To send notifications, updates, reminders, and other communications related to your use of the App, including reminders for appointments, health alerts, and new features.
privacy.How We Use Your InformationAns42: To comply with applicable laws and regulations, including medical records retention, reporting obligations, and responding to legal requests.
privacy.How We Use Your InformationAns52: To manage transactions, billing, and payment processing for services provided through the App.
privacy.Sharing of Your InformationAns12: We share your health information with the healthcare providers you engage with through the App, including doctors, specialists, and other medical professionals, to provide the necessary medical advice and services.
privacy.Sharing of Your InformationAns22: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate the App, process payments, manage data storage, and perform other functions on our behalf. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information.
privacy.Sharing of Your InformationAns32: We may disclose your information when required by law, such as in response to subpoenas, court orders, or government regulations, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of Medpredit, its users, or others.
privacy.Sharing of Your InformationAns42: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
privacy.Data RetentionAns12: We will retain your personal and health information for as long as necessary to provide the services you request, comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. After that period, your information will be securely deleted or anonymized, in accordance with applicable data retention policies.
privacy.Data SecurityAns12: We implement a range of security measures to protect your personal and health information, including encryption, access controls, and secure servers.
privacy.Data SecurityAns22: However, no method of data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns12: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns22: You can update or correct your information if it is inaccurate or incomplete.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns32: You can request that we delete your personal and health information, subject to applicable legal and regulatory requirements.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns42: You may request that we provide your data in a portable, machine-readable format.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns52: If we are processing your data based on your consent, you can withdraw consent at any time.
privacy.Your Rights and ChoicesAns62: You can opt out of receiving marketing emails and notifications from us by following the instructions in the communication or adjusting your preferences in the App.
privacy.International TransfersAns12: Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the country in which you reside.
privacy.International TransfersAns22: These countries may have different data protection laws, but we take appropriate steps to ensure that your personal data is handled securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.Children's PrivacyAns12: Medpredit is not intended for use by children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.Children's PrivacyAns22: If you are a parent or guardian and believe that we have collected information about your child, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.
privacy.Changes to This Privacy PolicyAns12: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technologies, or legal obligations.
privacy.Changes to This Privacy PolicyAns22: When we make changes, we will post the updated policy on this page and update the 'Last updated' date at the top of this document.
privacy.Changes to This Privacy PolicyAns32: Please review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed of any changes.

assessment.Seek professional advice if drinking aff: Seek professional advice if drinking affects your health or daily life.

assessment.Engage in strength training to support m: Engage in strength training to support metabolism.
assessment.Consult a healthcare provider for weight: Consult a healthcare provider for weight management support.
assessment.Analyze your sleep patterns and improve: Analyze your sleep patterns and improve rest quality.
assessment.Aim for 7-9 hours of sleep per night: Aim for 7-9 hours of sleep per night.
assessment.Maintain a consistent sleep schedule, ev: Maintain a consistent sleep schedule, even on weekends.
assessment.Ensure your sleeping environment is dark: Ensure your sleeping environment is dark and quiet.
assessment.Identify hereditary health risks and pre: Identify hereditary health risks and preventive measures.
assessment.Be aware of family history-related healt: Be aware of family history-related health conditions.
assessment.Schedule regular health screenings and c: Schedule regular health screenings and check-ups.
assessment.Maintain a healthy lifestyle to reduce g: Maintain a healthy lifestyle to reduce genetic risk factors.
assessment.Discuss family medical history with a he: Discuss family medical history with a healthcare provider.
assessment.Encourage family members to adopt health: Encourage family members to adopt healthy habits together.
